title: doc/go1.7html
body:
1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

go 1.6.1 and go1.7beta1

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

amd64 on RHEL7

3. What did you do?

In go1.6.1 I parsed a bad e-mail address of the form user@domain@domain (bug in my application)

in go1.7beta this now produces an error (as it should!)

https://play.golang.org/p/h4TzrsbZN5


4. What did you expect to see?

A note that this invalid form now errors rather than parses in go1.7

5. What did you see instead?

Other incompatibility notes, but not this one
